description: A quick and easy side dish of corn and rice, seasoned simply with salt.

steps.step: Rinse the brown rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
Heat the sunflower oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add the rinsed brown rice to the pan and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until lightly toasted.
Add the sweet corn kernels to the pan and stir to combine.
Continue to stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes until the corn is heated through and the rice is cooked to your liking. Add a little water if needed to steam the rice.
